parameters.content:
üìã GOOGLE SHEETS SETUP INSTRUCTIONS

‚úÖ Required Columns (create these in your Google Sheet):

1. Task - The task description
2. DueDate - When the task is due (format: YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY)
3. Status - Current status (Pending, Completed, In Progress)
4. Priority - Task priority (High, Medium, Low, Normal)

üìù Setup Steps:
1. Create a new Google Sheet
2. Name the first sheet "Tasks"
3. Add the 4 column headers in Row 1: Task | DueDate | Status | Priority
4. Copy the Google Sheet ID from the URL
5. Paste the Sheet ID in ALL Google Sheets nodes in this workflow
6. Connect your Google Sheets OAuth2 credentials

üí° Example Row:
Task: Complete project report
DueDate: 2024-01-15
Status: Pending
Priority: High

‚è∞ REMINDER SCHEDULE LOGIC

üìÖ Daily 10:30 AM Reminder:
- Sends a friendly message asking you to input tasks for the day
- Encourages you to chat with the bot to add tasks

üîî 3x Daily Pending Task Reminders:
- 9:00 AM - Morning reminder
- 2:00 PM - Afternoon reminder
- 7:00 PM - Evening reminder

‚úÖ How it works:
1. Three schedule triggers fire at different times
2. All triggers merge together
3. Workflow reads Google Sheets for tasks with Status = "Pending"
4. If pending tasks exist, formats a detailed message
5. Sends alert via Telegram with task details

üí° Tip: Mark tasks as "Completed" in the sheet to stop reminders!

ü§ñ AI AGENT CONFIGURATION

üéØ What the Agent Does:
- Understands natural language task requests
- Adds tasks to Google Sheets with proper fields
- Views and lists existing tasks
- Updates task status and details
- Maintains conversation context

üîß Key Components:
- OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for intelligence
- Conversation Memory (10 messages)
- Google Sheets Tool for data access

üí¨ Example Commands:
"Add task: Buy groceries, due tomorrow, high priority"
"Show me all my pending tasks"
"Mark task 3 as completed"
"What tasks are due this week?"

‚öôÔ∏è Required Setup:
1. Add OpenAI API credentials
2. Connect Google Sheets OAuth2
3. Set your Telegram Bot Token
4. Get your Telegram Chat ID
